page.title: 12Pastimes in Hemsworth 2
page.content: {Dancing } On a Wednesday night I go dancing from 7.30pm.until 8.30pm. I go to the Alfa Club to do ballroom, disco and team-work. The dancers are aged between seven and fifteen years. We have two classes and we have just done a test for gold bar two. For the test we did a solo of our own chosing and then two 'routine' dances; the 'New One'and the 'Boogie' followed by 'Flapjack'. Some of the first class did their test but they are on a lower level than us. The team also danced a routine for their test.
